Meditations and disquisitions upon the Lords prayer. By Sr. Richard Baker, Knight Baker, Richard, Sir, 1568-1645.
[8], 213, [3] p.
Printed by Anne Griffin, and are to be sold by Anne Bouler, at the signe of the Marigold, in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1636.
The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge). Library.
